content:
One can view Constable's most significant displays of his use of light and color in paintings at the following museums or galleries:

1. The National Gallery, London
2. Tate Britain, London
3. Victoria and Albert Museum, London
4. The Frick Collection, New York
5. The Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York
6. Museum of Fine Arts, Boston
7. Museum of Fine Arts, Houston
8. Art Institute of Chicago
9. National Gallery of Art, Washington D.C.
10. Louvre Museum, Paris.
